task.title: Use True Colors
task.shortdesc: There are more than 16 million true colors fromwhich you can choose. True colors are defined using 24- bit color.

context.p: Even with so many colors available, you can quickly choose a color fromthe display of basic colors or by clicking the color palette. Alternatively, if you know the values used to define the desired color, you can enter the Hue, Saturation, and Luminance (HSL) values, or you can enter the Red, Green, Blue (RGB) values.

step.cmd: Click Select Color in the desired dialog box, such as Layers, Properties, or Multiline Text. The Select Color dialog box opens.
Select one of the following two color models:
